title: Wout van Aert ‘not going anywhere’ as Jonas Vingegaard isn’t missing Primož Roglič
content:
Rumors of an early Van Aert departure are quickly shot down as Jumbo-Visma dodges Pogačar raid early in scorcher.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert ‘not going anywhere’ as Jonas Vingegaard isn’t missing Primož Roglič on Velo.
author: ahood
